speech:
1. Go to the Dialogflow ES Console. 
Click Create Agent in the left sidebar menu. (If you already have other agents, click the agent name, scroll to the bottom and click Create new agent.)  
Enter your agent's name, default language, default time zone and GCP project.  

2. Click Sub Agents in the left sidebar menu ( of mega/parent agent ). Select a sub-agent you wish to add to the mega/parent agent. The sub-agent Environment defaults to Draft, but you can update this as needed. If you want to use the Knowledge Base associated with the sub-agent, change the field from Excluded to Included.  Click Save.  

3. For each subagent :  
* Visit the IAM main page.
* Select the project for your sub-agent.
* Add your mega agent's service account email address (service-648372792242@gcp-sa-dialogflow.iam.gserviceaccount.com) as members of the project, and give them access to Dialogflow API Client.

3. For each subagent :

* Add your mega agent's service account email address (service-648372792242@gcp-sa-dialogflow.iam.gserviceaccount.com) as members of the project, and give them access to Dialogflow API Client.
